title: Moonlighter
notes: Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Some tinkering required**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**. You need to install the C++ runtime dependency.
genre: Role-playing (RPG), Adventure, Indie, Simulator, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up
description: Moonlighter is an Action RPG with rogue-lite elements that demonstrates two sides of the coin â€“ revealing everyday routines of Will, an adventurous shopkeeper that secretly dreams of becoming a hero.
